benchmark_details.name: SALT: Sales Autocompletion Linked Business Tables
benchmark_details.overview: The SALT dataset is specifically curated to mirror customer interactions within an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system, designed to support research in table representation learning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To stimulate advancements in table representation learning and enhance the applicability of models for real-world business contexts.

data.source: Sourced from an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system.
data.annotation: The dataset has undergone minimal pre-processing primarily aimed at addressing privacy concerns.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on the performance of baseline models on various prediction tasks.
methodology.interpretation: A higher MRR indicates better model performance in predicting the target variables.
methodology.baseline_results: XGBoost achieved MRR of 0.99 for several target variables.
methodology.validation: Validation segments were derived from temporal splits of the dataset.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset has undergone anonymization to mitigate privacy-related issues.
